snippet: An Israeli soldier was stabbed in the neck on Thursday while trying to make an arrest in a West Bank village, the Israeli military reported.
abstract: Israeli soldier is stabbed in the neck by Palestinian assailants while trying to make an arrest in a West Bank village.
lead_paragraph: An Israeli soldier was stabbed in the neck on Thursday while trying to make an arrest in a West Bank village, the Israeli military reported.

headline.main: Israel: Soldier Is Stabbed and Fires Back
headline.print_headline: Israel: Soldier Is Stabbed and Fires Back
